news.title: Honor’s new MagicPad 4 is the world’s thinnest Android tablet
news.summary: Honor has announced a new version of its already slim MagicPad tablet that's now even thinner. Last year's MagicPad 3 was just 5.8mm thick, but the new MagicPad 4 squeezes that down to 4.8mm.
